Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Strong binding and pore flexibility allow passage

Other Information.Additional Info: Adsorption capacity: 95 cm³ cm⁻³ at 0.01 bar

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Size exclusion due to smaller pore size

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale combined with strong binding sites for propyne

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, IAST calculation, DFT-D modeling
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C3H4/C3H6 selectivity: >20,000; C3H6 productivity: 62.9 mmol g⁻¹ (for 1/99 mixture)

Other Information.Additional Info: Record removal of trace propyne from propylene, producing 99.9999% pure propylene
